message: Hi Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for sale. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $200.
Hello Alice, thank you for offering the product. I appreciate the item, but I'm only able to pay up to $150 for it.

Hi Bob, thank you for your offer. I understand that $150 is your maximum budget, but I was thinking more along the lines of $175. The product is still worth a premium, and I'm willing to meet you halfway. Would you be willing to consider $175?
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. However, I'm still not able to go above $150 for the product. I appreciate your understanding.
